t: Amazon.com : The Carolina Nut Company Peanuts, Sea Salt and Pepper, 12 oz. : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Pricy, yes but I will pay for quality. Thank you Carolina Nut!!!! ... I love peanuts, it's really hard to find a bad one, well with this product I did. They are absolutely tasteless. Picking up a generic brand from a gas station checkout is a better quality peanut than these....

t: Amazon.com : The Carolina Nut Company Peanuts, 4 Fun Flavors, 12 oz (4 Tins of Nuts) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I had tasted these at a friend's ... The Carolina Nut Company Peanuts on Amazon I bought several 4 packs for family and friends' gifts. The dill pickle flavor is addictive! I don't like dill pickles but these peanuts are amazing! The nuts were fresh, crunchy and well seasoned. Will be buying these again! ... These peanuts have barely discernible flavor, are stale/not crunchy, and the quality of the nut is really inferior to even the cheapest generic brand of peanuts ...

t: Amazon.com : Carolina Nut Company Gourmet Peanuts Gift Package- 3 flavors (Salty) : Gourmet Candy Gifts : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Sorry Carolina Nut Company, but I will never order again. ... Oh My Goodness!!........... If you like nuts, - these will knock your socks OFF!! I got them as a Christmas gift in 2012, and I have stocked them in my house AND at work ever since! Definitely not the same Ol' Peanut you grew-up with!: Wow. Awesome balance of nutty, salty, and seasoned flavors,... very unique and utterly great taste. Do not miss the opportunity to treat yourself to this brand...
